title: A film for everyone!
review: Truly a film that everyone can enjoy, whether you're a superhero or comic fan or not! So very interesting to learn the history of these characters and all the different ways they have/continue to impact our world. Would highly recommend, very entertaining from start to finish, loved it!

title: Worth Watching
review: I loved this movie. It has depth and really delves deep into the history of comics. I loved the points they made in reference to Joseph Campbell! The interviews were interesting, and now I want to go to another Comicon!
